comments:
When I installed Mylar 0.4 on eclipse-SDK-I20051102-1600-win32.zip
I noticed the task list will nto load and the following error is logged.

Thanks for raising this.  Looking into it now.

Mylar should now support this integration build and hence Eclipse 3.2M3.  I'm now using
it for my development, but would appreciate it if one of you could verify by installing
from the following update site.  Note that you'll need to uninstall the previous 0.4.0
because the version number hasn't changed:

download.eclipse.org/technology/mylar/update-site/test

I couldn't get the task list to open with the regular update site, but after 
installing from download.eclipse.org/technology/mylar/update-site/test it 
worked. Should these changes go to the regular update site?

The 3.2M3 updates will go out with the 0.4.1 release, which is scheduled for
tomorrow evening.
